subproject.corporate outcome: Civil society, including civil society organizations and voluntary associations, and the private sector contribute to the MDGs in support of national planning strategies and policies
subproject.description: The project aims at supporting the National Secretariat for Human Rights in the consolidation of its new thematic areas of work such as conflict mediation, religious diversity, support to the implementation of the social agenda of the elderly, fight against homophobia, as well as the need of structuring an ombudsman as a means of implementing public policies based on principles of equality, equity and diversity. The project also aims at supporting the National Secretariat for Human Rights in providing training to its staff and partners on subjects related to Human Rights.
subproject.title: BRA/07/019 - Human Rights
